definition: Standard and Poor (share index)/abbr. for 標準普爾|标准普尔[Biao1 zhun3 Pu3 er3]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Deven Sharma is the president of Standard &Poor's.
But the S.& P. action hit a nerve.
sentences.chinese: 然而，標普的行動卻觸動了神經。

sentences.english: So, it should not be surprised to see an oversold relief bounce in the coming days.
sentences.chinese: 因此未來數日標普出現超跌反彈行情是不足爲奇的。

sentences.english: S&P did America a favour by pointing this out.
sentences.chinese: 標普爲美國指出這一點是幫了美國一把。

sentences.english: S&P in particular has cited $4 trillion in debt reduction as a figure that would be appropriate for keeping the triple-A rating.
sentences.chinese: 標普特別提到，維持AAA評級需要減債4萬億美元。

sentences.english: With that, members of the S&P team flew back to New York.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，標普這支團隊飛回了紐約。

sentences.english: Both the Dow and the S&P finished Thursday slightly above their August lows.
sentences.chinese: 道指和標普500指數週四收盤時只略高於8月低位。

sentences.english: Standard & Poor's announced that Deven Sharma was stepping down as its president.
sentences.chinese: 標普宣告他們的副總裁戴文薩馬正在淡出。

sentences.english: In fact, the S&P is nearly short-term oversold following recent consolidation.
sentences.chinese: 事實上經過近期整理之後，標普短期幾乎已超賣。

sentences.english: S&P rewrote its press release to reflect this change.
sentences.chinese: 標普重新撰寫了其新聞稿以反映這一變化。

sentences.english: And how did the rating agency react after this A-rated firm went bankrupt?
sentences.chinese: 那麼這家評級爲A的公司破產之後，標普作何反應？

sentences.english: The firm immediately switched to the more conservative deficit forecast.
sentences.chinese: 標普迅即轉而採用了對美國財政赤字更爲保守的預測。

sentences.english: Officials there quickly spotted a $2 trillion error in S.& P.’s calculations.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的官員很快發現標普的計算存在2萬億的錯誤。

sentences.english: "This supposition will, of course, be tested, " S&P wrote in its note.
sentences.chinese: “當然，這種推測將受到考驗，”標普在報告中寫道。

sentences.english: As anticipated, the index continues basing sideway near support.
sentences.chinese: 恰如我們所料，昨天標普繼續在支撐附近橫向運行。

definition: Hang Seng index (of Hong Kong stock market)
Standard and Poor's (S&P), company specializing in financial market ratings/S&P financial index
NASDAQ/National Association of Securities Dealers Automated Quotations, a computerized data system to provide brokers with price quotations for securities traded over the counter
(Tw) to lower (prices, interest rates etc)/to reduce/to cut
